front.title: Requirements and Framework for Point-to-Multipoint Pseudowires over MPLS PSNs

abstract.t: This document presents a set of requirements and a framework for providing a Point-to-Multipoint Pseudowire (PW). The requirements identified in this document are related to architecture, signaling and maintenance aspects of Point-to-Multipoint PW operation. They are proposed as guidelines for the standardization of such mechanisms. Among other potential applications Point-to-Multipoint PWs SHOULD be used to optimize the support of multicast layer 2 services (Virtual Private LAN Service and Virtual Private Multicast Service) as defined in the Layer 2 Virtual Private Network Working Group.
